description: Mens iconic hiker cleans up nice, no? This casual slip-on shoe treks into the everyday, with the same classic Targhee fit, comfort, and traction, plus a smooth, premium leather upper and breathable lining.
name: Keen Targhee III Slip-On - Mens

specs.value: Keen.All-Terrain rubber outsole for higher-traction grip
Removable PU insole with arch support for long-lasting comfort
Elastic gore for easy on & off
Eco Anti-Odor for natural odor control
